Version 2.0.76 - Captivate SCORM: Real-Time Position Tracking

Bug Fixes

  • Parse Captivate suspend_data format (cs=N,vs=0:1:2:3,...) for slide position extraction
  • Position bar now follows Captivate slide navigation in real time via content variable polling
  • Generic position detection no longer permanently disabled when SCORM API goes stale

Changes

  • Added Captivate cs=N format to parseSlideFromSuspendData and modifySuspendDataForSlide
  • Added cpInfoCurrentSlide/cpInfoCurrentSlideIndex and CURRENT_SLIDE to content variable detection
  • Track lastApiChangeTime; allow generic detection when API stale for >5 seconds

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.75: Fix position bar jumping to furthest during tag navigation
  • v2.0.74: Prevent lesson_location from going backward in DB for correct resume on refresh
  • v2.0.73: Persist furthestSlide in localStorage for cross-tab/refresh resume
